name: Rental Chan
description:
Work in progress demo

This is a 3D school simulator GL game made for Yuri Jam 2022. The lead game designer, Pixitales has made a lot of games over the past 3 years. The biggest star of this project is importing 3D models made in Vroid Studio into Unity. This made this project very fun to work with and we learned a lot of new things. One struggle we had is we are missing a writer on the team, so I have to take over. I have never written a full game story in my life. There might be writing mistakes here and there. At first, I wasn't going to publish this because the story isn't finished, but the team was very supportive and now I submitted it. I hope you guys enjoy it!

Summary

Racheal works for an app called Rent-A-Friend. She gets paid for being friends with people for a limited time.  She needs money to pay for her little sister's hospital bills who is being treated for a rare disease. When a rare opportunity comes up, a family is worried about their daughter and is willing to pay Rachael a large sum of money to transfer schools and befriend with until the end of the school year. 

Team
  • Pixitales - Game designer, 2d artist, programmer, story writer
  • Invadererik - Programmer, shader
  • Himeko Katagiri (Seifuku Sound) - Music composer

Main assets used

  1. Character models are made using Vroid Studio.
  2. Ink, dialogue script writer
